oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Conservative and surgical treatment of tibial fractures in cattle
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Martens, A.
Steenhaut, M.
Gasthuys, F.
De Cupere, C.
De Moor, A.
Verschooten, F.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: tibial fractures
unilateral fracture
repair
treatment
bodyweight
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Ninety-five cattle with tibial fractures, all but one with a unilateral fracture, were examined between 1990 and 1994. The feasibility of repairing the fracture was assessed radiographically, also taking into account the bodyweight and value of the animal. Full article in Veterinary Record (1998) 143, 12-16.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1998; 86
